page.title: 09A DAY OUT IN SQUARE THREE
page.content:
Square three was Landkey. My group went in Mrs. Moore's car. When we got to Landkey all we could see was fields. As we drove on we saw the village and we stopped there to do our sketches. I drew the "Ring o' Bells" inn. Also I drew the houses that were attached to it. After doing our sketches we walked down to the river. We stayed there for a while then made our way back to the car which was parked near the church. We got into the car and made our way back to school with a little time to spare.
Sally Hookins
Bishops Tawton Primary School
